settings.title: Elevate your cooking skills with online classes

settings.editor: Become a member and get unlimited access to all of our online cooking courses. They are designed for all skill levels, from cooking novice to advanced cooks, and are led by professional chefs.
Try 14 days for free. Cancel anytime.

settings.description_text: Cooking school that fits into your schedule. Practice your cooking skills anytime, with courses from any device
Get an exclusive opportunity to participate in fully interactive online cooking classes delivered by top chefs
Gain access to more than 50 online courses and learn cooking techniques from a variety of cuisines from around the world
Discover over 100 simple and delicious recipes, tips, and tricks for novice as well as experienced cooks

settings.title: Learn at your own pace and join the table community

settings.editor: The table is an online cooking school, that helps home cooks of all levels access high-quality cooking training internationally. Our online classes allow young cooks to learn at their own pace from the comfort of their homes, receive personalized attention from expert chefs, engage with other students, and access excellent cooking resources to excel in their kitchens!
Watch how our online cooking school works

settings.blockquote_content: “Great cooking courses for someone with no cooking skills at all. The videos are very clear with step-by-step instructions from talented chefs. I learned how to cook different kinds of food in different ways.”

“I am an amateur cook with advanced cooking skills, but I wanted to learn how to create unique dishes from different cuisines that will wow my friends. The table is an amazing platform to practice and improve!”

settings.title: Interested in becoming a better cook?

settings.editor: Start to learn free for 2 weeks and join over 200,000 happy cooks worldwide
